articles.title: Biden announces measures to incentivize Covid-19 vaccinations, including a requirement for federal employees - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Thursday announced a number of new steps his administration will take to try to get more Americans vaccinated and slow the spread of coronavirus, including requiring that all federal employees must attest to being vaccinated against Cov…

articles.author: Sibongile Khumalo
articles.title: Anglo American rides out Covid-19 storm with massive R177bn in half-year earnings - News24
articles.description: Growth was spurred by the performance of platinum group metals and copper, which have benefitted from the demand from uses linked to the rising decarbonisation initiatives, including the electric vehicles.
articles.content:
• Anglo American banked $12.1 billion (R177.5 billion) in earnings in the first half of 2021
  • Basic headline earnings per share rose to $4.22 compared to $0.49 in the first half in 2020<… [+2548 chars]

articles.title: 'Breaking Bad' actor hospitalized after collapsing on set - Tamil News - IndiaGlitz.com
articles.description: American actor Bob Odenkirk has been hospitalized after he collapsed on the set of his show 'Better Call Saul' in New Mexico.
